title: SouthStar Lofts offers luxury loft living in Philadelphia
description: SouthStar Lofts offers luxury loft living along the famed Avenue of the Arts in Philadelphia PA. Each home features spacious floor plans with bamboo wood flooring, modern kitchens with stainless steel appliances, upgraded cabinetry, granite countertops and floor to ceiling windows boasting impressive city views. Homes also include a washer and dryer, spacious walk-in closets and a private balcony in select homes. Our pet-friendly community is smoke-free and includes access to our state-of-the-art fitness center and clubroom with demonstration kitchen. Feel secure with controlled access entry, on-site management and maintenance teams. Walkable distance to restaurants, parks, theaters and shopping - including our own on-site retail with City Diner and Kosmo's Pizzeria. Also, commuting has never been easier with on-site parking and bike storage available, easy access to major highways with the Broad Street Subway Station and multiple forms of public transportation right outside your door. Live a life of style, comfort and convenience at SouthStar Lofts! ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Guarantors welcome. *Conditions apply and subject to change without notice. ****Virtual tours available****

title: 3br - The large house has 3 bedrooms 1.5 baths`!!
description:
Quintessential house in the beautiful Graduate Hospital neighborhood is available for rent early July. The large house has 3 bedrooms, living room, dining room, kitchen, 1.5 baths, lovely backyard and a large basement for storage.
Enter the home into an inviting, light-filled vestibule with glass doors, transom windows, and crown molding. The first floor boasts a wide-open floor plan with new hardwood floors, ceiling fans, large living room, dining room, powder room, new kitchen. The kitchen features wood cabinets, granite counters, breakfast nook, stainless steel appliances, and gas cooking. The steel door with elegant decorative glass leads to a charming backyard great for gardening, barbeque grilling, and entertaining friends and family.
Walk up on the original staircase to the 2nd floor where you will find 3 sun-soaked, spacious bedrooms and a full hall bathroom. The basement is unfinished, but clean and perfect for a home gym or storage area. The laundry area is also in the basement.
House has terrific original details, including exposed wood beams, exposed brick, gorgeous original wood floors on the 2nd floor, and crown molding.
Centrally located just blocks from Rittenhouse Square and awesome hot spots in the Graduate Hospital area such as Fitzwater Street Philly bagels, The Sidecar Bar, Jinxed, Giant Heirloom Market, Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewery, Ultimo Coffee, parks, gyms, and many restaurants.

Located on the border of Brewerytown & Strawberry Mansion, this area has more and more to offer every day! Aside from Wok Works directly across from the property, enjoy catching drinks and snacks at the Crime and Punishment Brewerytown, lunch at Vento or Ryebread, or have dinner at Nine Thai! title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. title: Spaciousness of true loft living! Welcome home!
description:
Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! Your monthly rent includes extended cable TV service, access to our fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with an attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant and more! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. The original character of the building has been enhanced by modern accents and furnishings, creating a unique and sophisticated environment. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Meet and socialize with fellow residents on our rooftop deck lounge, or take advantage of our cyber cafe and yoga studio to stay connected and centered. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!

title: Tremendous one-bed condo is strategically placed in lift building!
description:
This HUGE one-bedroom apartment is conveniently located in an elevator building, just steps away from the subway, restaurants, cafes, bars, and galleries, boasting a 99 Walk Score and Transit Score. You'll love the historical integrity of this beautiful and unique unit with hardwood floors, soaring windows, and lots of natural light. The updated kitchen features white cabinetry, appliances, and granite countertops with a breakfast bar. The open concept dining and living room has high ceilings, exposed beams, and a wood-burning fireplace. The large bedroom features extensive closet space and abundant natural light. The bathroom welcomes you with a whirlpool tub, recessed lighting, and a closet with washer/dryer. Additional storage in the attic above the unit. Enjoy stunning views of Center City, the Delaware River, and Ben Franklin Bridge from the recently-renovated roof deck!
